condition.description:
Coronary artery disease (CAD) is the most common type of heart disease. It is the leading cause of death in the United States in both men and women.

CAD happens when the arteries that supply blood to heart muscle become hardened and narrowed. This is due to the buildup of cholesterol and other material, called plaque, on their inner walls. This buildup is called atherosclerosis. As it grows, less blood can flow through the arteries. As a result, the heart muscle can't get the blood or oxygen it needs. This can lead to chest pain (angina) or a heart attack. Most heart attacks happen when a blood clot suddenly cuts off the hearts' blood supply, causing permanent heart damage.

Over time, CAD can also weaken the heart muscle and contribute to heart failure and arrhythmias. Heart failure means the heart can't pump blood well to the rest of the body. Arrhythmias are changes in the normal beating rhythm of the heart.

NIH: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute
condition.name: Coronary artery disease

carousel_items: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides, and raises good cholesterol.
Most people reach their target cholesterol levels in 4 to 6 weeks.
Works best if you take it once a day after your evening meal.
Avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice while taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever, or weakness.
Tell your doctor if you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin.
Certain medications can interact with this drug. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist.

clock.tip: Take with evening meal and avoid grapefruit juice.
Take with food and avoid grapefruit juice.

basics.benefits_moa: Lovastatin is cholesterol-lowering medicine called a statin. It lowers the amount of cholesterol your body makes, which helps lower "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Lovastatin can improve cholesterol, but it's not as strong as other statin medicines. Statin side effects can be difficult to deal with, but the benefits might outweigh the risks.
downsides: Not the best choice for people who have very high cholesterol levels.

Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: Not the best choice for people who have very high cholesterol levels.

Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.

drugs.name: Lovastatin

labeled_indications.indication: Hereditary high cholesterol diseases in adolescents

carousel_items_processed.orig: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides, and raises good cholesterol.
Most people reach their target cholesterol levels in 4 to 6 weeks.
Works best if you take it once a day after your evening meal.
Avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice while taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever, or weakness.
Tell your doctor if you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin.
Certain medications can interact with this drug. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: There are rare cases of muscle damage leading to kidney failure in people taking Lovastatin. The risk is greater in people with kidney disease or thyroid disease, are older and female and taking certain cholesterol-lowering medication combinations. Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, weakness or fever and there is no known cause.

description_processed.orig: There are rare cases of muscle damage leading to kidney failure in people taking Lovastatin. The risk is greater in people with kidney disease or thyroid disease, are older and female and taking certain cholesterol-lowering medication combinations. Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, weakness or fever and there is no known cause.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There are reports of liver damage in people who take Lovastatin, especially if they are heavy alcohol drinkers or have a history of liver disease. If you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin, tell your doctor. Your doctor may also want to check your liver function periodically.

description_processed.orig: There are reports of liver damage in people who take Lovastatin, especially if they are heavy alcohol drinkers or have a history of liver disease. If you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin, tell your doctor. Your doctor may also want to check your liver function periodically.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Don't use while pregnant it can harm your unborn baby. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Don't use while pregnant it can harm your unborn baby. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Drug interactions
risks_warnings.description: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis) and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.
risk_factors: Taking with certain drugs that increase the dose of Lovastatin in the body

description_processed.orig: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis) and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle weakness (autoimmune)
risks_warnings.description: There are rare cases of autoimmune-mediated (meaning the body attacks itself) muscle weakness with Lovastatin. Let your doctor know if you notice severe muscle weakness. You may have to stop taking Lovastatin.

description_processed.orig: There are rare cases of autoimmune-mediated (meaning the body attacks itself) muscle weakness with Lovastatin. Let your doctor know if you notice severe muscle weakness. You may have to stop taking Lovastatin.

carousel_items: Take it at bedtime with a low-fat snack.
Avoid alcohol, spicy foods, and hot beverages right before you take this medicine.
Can cause flushing.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle pain.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

basics.benefits_moa: niacin is a cholesterol-lowering medicine. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to lower the amount of "bad" cholesterol (LDL) made by the liver. It may also help your body process cholesterol.
basics.bottom_line: niacin is good for lowering triglycerides (fats), but it's not as good as statins for improving cholesterol.
downsides: By itself, niacin is not as effective as statins for improving cholesterol.
Can cause flushing and stomach pain or discomfort.
You have to take it before bedtime with a low-fat snack.
If you don't take it regularly, you might have to re-start the medicine at a lower dose.

downsides_processed.orig: By itself, niacin is not as effective as statins for improving cholesterol.
Can cause flushing and stomach pain or discomfort.
You have to take it before bedtime with a low-fat snack.
If you don't take it regularly, you might have to re-start the medicine at a lower dose.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Lowers the risk of a second heart attack.
Good for lowering triglycerides (fats).

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Lowers the risk of a second heart attack.

drugs.name: Niaspan

labeled_indications.indication: Recurrent heart attack prevention with high cholesterol

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take it at bedtime with a low-fat snack.
Avoid alcohol, spicy foods, and hot beverages right before you take this medicine.
Can cause flushing.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle pain.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: People on Niacin while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

description_processed.orig: People on Niacin while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: People who take Niacin have reported liver damage, especially if taken with statins or if you drink large amounts of alcohol. This has been rare. Talk to your doctor if you've ever had liver disease as they may discuss alternatives, or they may monitor your liver with blood tests.

description_processed.orig: People who take Niacin have reported liver damage, especially if taken with statins or if you drink large amounts of alcohol. This has been rare. Talk to your doctor if you've ever had liver disease as they may discuss alternatives, or they may monitor your liver with blood tests.

risks_warnings.title: High blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: People with diabetes may have increases in their blood sugar levels while taking Niacin, especially during the first few months of taking this medication. Your doctor will work closely with you to see if changes to your diabetes medications are needed.

description_processed.orig: People with diabetes may have increases in their blood sugar levels while taking Niacin, especially during the first few months of taking this medication. Your doctor will work closely with you to see if changes to your diabetes medications are needed.

risks_warnings.title: Low platelets
risks_warnings.description: People on anticoagulants while on Niacin may have decreases in their platelet counts on blood tests. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

description_processed.orig: People on anticoagulants while on Niacin may have decreases in their platelet counts on blood tests. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

carousel_items: Lowers triglycerides.
Take it with food.
Swallow capsules whole.
Can cause burping and changes in taste.
Don't use if you have an allergy to fish or shellfish.
You should use this medicine in combination with a healthy diet.

basics.benefits_moa: Omega-3 Acid is a cholesterol-lowering medicine. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it may help the liver remove triglycerides from your body, and also prevent your body from making more triglycerides.
basics.bottom_line: Omega-3 Acid is good for lowering triglycerides (fats), but some people can't take it due to allergies.
downsides: You can't take it if you're allergic to fish or shellfish.
You have to take it with food.

downsides_processed.orig: You can't take it if you're allergic to fish or shellfish.
You have to take it with food.

upsides: Lowers triglycerides (fats) when combined with exercise and a low cholesterol diet.
In studies, Omega-3 Acid has lowered the risk of stroke and heart attack leading to death, especially in people with high cholesterol or high triglycerides.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers triglycerides (fats) when combined with exercise and a low cholesterol diet.
In studies, Omega-3 Acid has lowered the risk of stroke and heart attack leading to death, especially in people with high cholesterol or high triglycerides.

drugs.name: Omega 3 Acid

carousel_items_processed.orig: Lowers triglycerides.
Take it with food.
Swallow capsules whole.
Can cause burping and changes in taste.
Don't use if you have an allergy to fish or shellfish.
You should use this medicine in combination with a healthy diet.

risks_warnings.title: Allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: If you know you are allergic to fish or shellfish, talk to your doctor as Omega-3 Acid is made from different types of fish and shellfish. They may prescribe an alternative.

description_processed.orig: If you know you are allergic to fish or shellfish, talk to your doctor as Omega-3 Acid is made from different types of fish and shellfish. They may prescribe an alternative.

risks_warnings.title: Heart flutter
risks_warnings.description: If you have had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation, talk to your doctor, as Omega-3 Acid may cause heart flutters, especially during the first few months of taking Omega-3 Acid.

description_processed.orig: If you have had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation, talk to your doctor, as Omega-3 Acid may cause heart flutters, especially during the first few months of taking Omega-3 Acid.

basics.benefits_moa: Pravastatin is cholesterol-lowering medicine called a statin. It lowers the amount of cholesterol your body makes, which helps lower "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Pravastatin can improve cholesterol, but it's not as strong as other statin medicines. Statin side effects can be difficult to deal with, but the benefits might outweigh the risks.
downsides: Not the best choice for people who have very high cholesterol levels.

Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

userStories.tip: You need to monitor Creatinine Clearance because - even though you may not experience muscle pain - all statins can cause rhabdymylosis (a form of muscle wasting) in a percentage of users. The waste product is excreted through the kidneys.
Try to take at bedtime for the best results.

Pravastatin lowered my cholesterol numbers significantly, but I'm not entirely convinced of the necessity of long-term, maintenance-dose statins for a person with my blood numbers. Also, at first I would feel tired and slow-witted.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: Within three days experienced muscle pain.  Could only lift half to two thirds the weight (at gym) I could before taking it..  I stopped it after five days.

carousel_items: Thins your blood to prevent clots from forming or getting bigger. Doesn't break up existing clots.
The amount you need depends on your diet, other medical problems, and genes.
Take it exactly as instructed.
Can raise your risk of bleeding or bruising.
Requires regular blood tests to get your dose right.
Interacts with a lot of medicines and supplements. Don't start any new meds without talking to your doctor.
Eat foods containing consistent amounts of Vitamin K.
Tell your doctor immediately if you fell or if you have unusual bleeding, bruising, swelling, or changes in vision and coordination.
Get a medical bracelet so that people know you're on a blood thinner during an emergency situation.

basics.benefits_moa: Warfarin is an anticoagulant blood thinner. It lowers chemicals called clotting factors so that it's harder for your body to form blood clots.
basics.bottom_line: Warfarin is an old, cheap, and effective medicine to prevent blood clots, but it requires some monitoring, dose adjustments, and even lifestyle changes.
downsides: Raises your risk of bleeding and bruising.
Requires routine blood testing (called an INR) to see how well the medicine is working for you and to make the dose just right for you.
Many lifestyle factors can affect how well warfarin works, such as diet, alcohol, and activity level, so it's important that you try to stay consistent with your behaviors.
Lots of interactions with other drugs or supplements. Always check with your doctor or pharmacist before starting any new meds.

downsides_processed.orig: Raises your risk of bleeding and bruising.
Requires routine blood testing (called an INR) to see how well the medicine is working for you and to make the dose just right for you.
Many lifestyle factors can affect how well warfarin works, such as diet, alcohol, and activity level, so it's important that you try to stay consistent with your behaviors.
Lots of interactions with other drugs or supplements. Always check with your doctor or pharmacist before starting any new meds.

upsides: Oral blood-thinning medicine that prevents blood clots from forming or getting bigger.

Prevents complications of blood clots that can cause extreme discomfort or death. Examples include stroke (blood clots in the brain), pulmonary embolism (blood clots in the lungs causing trouble breathing), or deep vein thrombosis (blood clots in the legs causing pain and blood vessel damage).
Has an antidote, Vitamin K, in case of a major accidental bleeding.
Warfarin has been around for a long time, so we know a lot about how well it works and what the risks are.
It's dirt cheap.

upsides_processed.orig: Oral blood-thinning medicine that prevents blood clots from forming or getting bigger.

Prevents complications of blood clots that can cause extreme discomfort or death. Examples include stroke (blood clots in the brain), pulmonary embolism (blood clots in the lungs causing trouble breathing), or deep vein thrombosis (blood clots in the legs causing pain and blood vessel damage).
Has an antidote, Vitamin K, in case of a major accidental bleeding.
Warfarin has been around for a long time, so we know a lot about how well it works and what the risks are.
It's dirt cheap.

userStories.indication: Artificial heart valve blood clot prevention

userStories.tip: Causes gums to bleed after brushing teeth.
Take at same time daily, get your INR blood test per Dr. & eat same amounts of vitamin k rich foods daily

userStories.identifier: healthy, does yoga, eats very well,
userStories.tip: Very hard to adjust dosage based on a diet that includes a wide variety of foods and in particular the healthier green foods that contain high levels of vitamin K

drugs.name: Coumadin

labeled_indications.indication: Artificial heart valve blood clot prevention

carousel_items_processed.orig: Thins your blood to prevent clots from forming or getting bigger. Doesn't break up existing clots.
The amount you need depends on your diet, other medical problems, and genes.
Take it exactly as instructed.
Can raise your risk of bleeding or bruising.
Requires regular blood tests to get your dose right.
Interacts with a lot of medicines and supplements. Don't start any new meds without talking to your doctor.
Eat foods containing consistent amounts of Vitamin K.
Tell your doctor immediately if you fell or if you have unusual bleeding, bruising, swelling, or changes in vision and coordination.
Get a medical bracelet so that people know you're on a blood thinner during an emergency situation.

risks_warnings.title: Life threatening bleeding
risks_warnings.description: Warfarin is a blood thinner that makes it harder for your blood to clot. Your body may not be able to stop bleeds the way it normally does. Regular monitoring through blood tests, taking the exact amount as instructed, and having a consistent diet can lower your risk of bleeding. Let your doctor know about any persistent or frequent bleeding or bruising, pink urine, red or coffee-ground like stools. If you are bleeding a lot for more than 15 minutes, have a bruise that is getting bigger instead of better, or have fallen and hit your head, go get immediate medical help. In the hospital, doctors can give you a medicine that can reverse the effects of Warfarin.

description_processed.orig: Warfarin is a blood thinner that makes it harder for your blood to clot. Your body may not be able to stop bleeds the way it normally does. Regular monitoring through blood tests, taking the exact amount as instructed, and having a consistent diet can lower your risk of bleeding. Let your doctor know about any persistent or frequent bleeding or bruising, pink urine, red or coffee-ground like stools. If you are bleeding a lot for more than 15 minutes, have a bruise that is getting bigger instead of better, or have fallen and hit your head, go get immediate medical help. In the hospital, doctors can give you a medicine that can reverse the effects of Warfarin.

risks_warnings.title: Dying skin or tissue needing surgery or amputation
risks_warnings.description: Warfarin can cause this rare, but serious, condition where the skin or tissue is dying from poor blood flow. The risk is highest in the first few days to week 8 of starting Warfarin. Let your doctor know about any unusual changes in color of your extremities, breasts, or penis. Your doctor will then find you another blood-thinning medicine to replace Warfarin.

description_processed.orig: Warfarin can cause this rare, but serious, condition where the skin or tissue is dying from poor blood flow. The risk is highest in the first few days to week 8 of starting Warfarin. Let your doctor know about any unusual changes in color of your extremities, breasts, or penis. Your doctor will then find you another blood-thinning medicine to replace Warfarin.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Warfarin causes birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Warfarin causes birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

points.name: Necrosis of skin and other tissues

carousel_items: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Interacts with grapefruit and the cholesterol medicine Simvastatin.
Can cause constipation and headache.
Don't drink too much alcohol while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

basics.benefits_moa: Verapamil is a calcium channel blocker. It lowers blood pressure by slowing your heart rate and relaxing your blood vessels. Your heart gets more oxygen and doesn't have to work as hard to pump, which can relieve chest pain.
basics.bottom_line: Verapamil works well to lower blood pressure and prevent chest pain, but you have to be okay with avoiding alcohol. You can't miss doses, and you might get persistent swelling.
downsides: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Verapamil than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Verapamil suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you drink alcohol.

downsides_processed.orig: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Verapamil than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Verapamil suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you drink alcohol.

upsides: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Treats certain abnormal heart rhythms.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Treats certain abnormal heart rhythms.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and controls heart rate.

userStories.tip: Can't take it on an empty stomach

drugs.name: Calan

labeled_indications.indication: Abnormal heart rhythm prevention and treatment

carousel_items_processed.orig: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Interacts with grapefruit and the cholesterol medicine Simvastatin.
Can cause constipation and headache.
Don't drink too much alcohol while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

risks_warnings.title: Heart failure
risks_warnings.description: Reports of heart failure or pulmonary edema (increased fluid in the lungs) have been reported. If your doctor feels that Verapamil will work for you, they will work with you to control the issues with your heart before starting Verapamil.

description_processed.orig: Reports of heart failure or pulmonary edema (increased fluid in the lungs) have been reported. If your doctor feels that Verapamil will work for you, they will work with you to control the issues with your heart before starting Verapamil.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: You may experience sudden drops in blood pressure while on Verapamil, which may cause dizziness. Be careful when getting up from either a seated or lying down position to prevent falls.

description_processed.orig: You may experience sudden drops in blood pressure while on Verapamil, which may cause dizziness. Be careful when getting up from either a seated or lying down position to prevent falls.

risks_warnings.title: Elevated liver enzymes
risks_warnings.description: Your doctor may check your liver regularly, as there have been reports of liver damage which can only be seen through blood tests. If you do have a history of liver disease, let your doctor know.

description_processed.orig: Your doctor may check your liver regularly, as there have been reports of liver damage which can only be seen through blood tests. If you do have a history of liver disease, let your doctor know.

risks_warnings.title: Heart rhythm problems
risks_warnings.description: Your doctor may monitor your heart to see if changes to its electrical system may occur, especially if you have had liver or kidney disease in the past.

description_processed.orig: Your doctor may monitor your heart to see if changes to its electrical system may occur, especially if you have had liver or kidney disease in the past.

carousel_items: The dose of Prometrium will be different depending on what youre using it for, so take it exactly the way your doctor tells you.
It's important to take it the same time every day.
Prometrium capsules can make you feel tired or dizzy, so take it just before you go to sleep every night.
If you have trouble swallowing the capsule, take it with a full glass of water while standing up.
Can cause cramps, bloating, trouble sleeping, acne, weight gain, facial skin discoloration, or irregular periods.
Tell your doctor about any severe stomach pain or yellowing of your eyes or skin.
Get immediate medical help if you have sudden vision changes or one-sided weakness (signs of stroke) or chest pain and trouble breathing (signs of a pulmonary embolism).

basics.benefits_moa: Prometrium contains progesterone, a hormone that regulates the menstrual cycle and protects the uterus from the negative effects of estrogen when used for postmenopausal treatment.
basics.bottom_line: Prometrium regulates menstrual cycles, treats heavy bleeding, and prevents thickening of the uterus.
downsides: Prometrium capsules contain peanut oil, so you can't take it if you're allergic to peanuts.
Prometrium can cause serious birth defects in babies, so you can't take Prometrium if youre pregnant or breast-feeding.
Increases your risk of blood clots.

downsides_processed.orig: Prometrium capsules contain peanut oil, so you can't take it if you're allergic to peanuts.
Prometrium can cause serious birth defects in babies, so you can't take Prometrium if youre pregnant or breast-feeding.
Increases your risk of blood clots.

upsides: Helps to regulate your menstrual cycle.
Relives pain from endometriosis.
Lowers the risk of uterine cancer when used with estrogen in women with an intact uterus.
Available as a capsule or an injection, so you can choose what works best for you.

upsides_processed.orig: Helps to regulate your menstrual cycle.
Relives pain from endometriosis.
Lowers the risk of uterine cancer when used with estrogen in women with an intact uterus.
Available as a capsule or an injection, so you can choose what works best for you.

drugs.one_liner: Taken for irregular bleeding or paired with estrogen replacements for menopause.
drugs.name: Prometrium

labeled_indications.indication: Prevention of uterine cancer in women taking estrogen

carousel_items_processed.orig: The dose of Prometrium will be different depending on what youre using it for, so take it exactly the way your doctor tells you.
It's important to take it the same time every day.
Prometrium capsules can make you feel tired or dizzy, so take it just before you go to sleep every night.
If you have trouble swallowing the capsule, take it with a full glass of water while standing up.
Can cause cramps, bloating, trouble sleeping, acne, weight gain, facial skin discoloration, or irregular periods.
Tell your doctor about any severe stomach pain or yellowing of your eyes or skin.
Get immediate medical help if you have sudden vision changes or one-sided weakness (signs of stroke) or chest pain and trouble breathing (signs of a pulmonary embolism).

risks_warnings.title: Breast cancer
risks_warnings.description: It is not completely clear if progestin, like as Prometrium, increases your risk of breast cancer. There may be a higher risk if you have a history of breast cancer, so make sure to get routine breast exams.
risk_factors: Personal or family history of breast cancer

description_processed.orig: It is not completely clear if progestin, like as Prometrium, increases your risk of breast cancer. There may be a higher risk if you have a history of breast cancer, so make sure to get routine breast exams.

risks_warnings.title: Ovarian cancer
risks_warnings.description: Prometrium contains progestin. It could cause a higher risk of ovarian cancer, especially if you have a family history of it. Your doctor can help you weigh the risks versus the benefits of this medication.

description_processed.orig: Prometrium contains progestin. It could cause a higher risk of ovarian cancer, especially if you have a family history of it. Your doctor can help you weigh the risks versus the benefits of this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk of blood clots and stroke
risks_warnings.description: Using progestin with or without estrogen can increase your risk of blood clots. Blood clots can cause pain and discomfort from a deep vein thrombosis (a clot in the arm or leg), or serious disability due to a stroke or pulmonary embolism (a clot in the brain or lung). Get medical care right away if you have pain in your legs or arms, bad headaches, trouble breathing, or sudden changes in your speech or vision.
risk_factors: Personal or family history of blood clots

description_processed.orig: Using progestin with or without estrogen can increase your risk of blood clots. Blood clots can cause pain and discomfort from a deep vein thrombosis (a clot in the arm or leg), or serious disability due to a stroke or pulmonary embolism (a clot in the brain or lung). Get medical care right away if you have pain in your legs or arms, bad headaches, trouble breathing, or sudden changes in your speech or vision.

risks_warnings.title: Severe allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Prometrium contains peanut oil and can cause allergic reactions (severe rash, itching, trouble breathing) or angioedema (mouth swelling). Call your doctor and get emergency care immediately if you notice any of these symptoms.

description_processed.orig: Prometrium contains peanut oil and can cause allergic reactions (severe rash, itching, trouble breathing) or angioedema (mouth swelling). Call your doctor and get emergency care immediately if you notice any of these symptoms.

risks_warnings.title: Fluid retention (Foot and leg swelling)
risks_warnings.description: Prometrium can cause extra fluid to build up in your legs, ankles, feet, and sometimes arms and hands. It can be mild to severe and may not go away immediately. Swelling can be worse if you have other medical conditions that increase your risk. If it becomes severe, talk to your doctor since you may need to stop taking Prometrium.

description_processed.orig: Prometrium can cause extra fluid to build up in your legs, ankles, feet, and sometimes arms and hands. It can be mild to severe and may not go away immediately. Swelling can be worse if you have other medical conditions that increase your risk. If it becomes severe, talk to your doctor since you may need to stop taking Prometrium.

risks_warnings.title: Depression
risks_warnings.description: Prometrium can cause depression. Let your doctor know if you have a history of, or are taking medicines to treat, depression before starting Prometrium.

description_processed.orig: Prometrium can cause depression. Let your doctor know if you have a history of, or are taking medicines to treat, depression before starting Prometrium.
